page.title: 06HULLAND CHRIST CHURCH
page.content: This delightful rural Church is placed just off the main road and is a{Gothic {Church}of{1851}with a{short chancel and{lofty nave.}It boasts{battlements and{stain glass windows}two of which represent{Hope}and{Faith.}The vicar of the church also covers the churches at {Atlow,Biggin, and Hognaston. Hulland {Church}has about{one hundred graves dating from when the church was built until the present day. The church is {dedicated}to{Christ}and is{one hundred {and thirty four years old.}The church holds about{one hundred and fifty people. The{pulpit}has two{deckers}and there is a{hatchment}the{Borough family.
